comment: The Legendre symbol is equivalent to ` a ^ ( ( p - 1 ) / 2 ) ` , ` mod p ` . This theorem is also called "Euler's criterion", see theorem 9.2 in [ApostolNT] p. 180, or a representation of Euler's criterion using the Legendre symbol, see also ~ lgsqr .
